quote.msg:
On Francis Coquelin

He goes to Valencia. He didn’t get enough game with us this season, he had an opportunity and I let him go.

Will you replace him?

First of all the best way to replace him is to get Aaron Ramsey back and Mesut Ozil back. That will help.
